content: Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 20 Dec 2018I signed up for SG Bonus and even linked my paynow to my NRIC before 7 November, how come I haven't receive it yet?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019You seems to have did all things correct. You can login to : http://www.singaporebudget.gov.sg/sgbonus to double check all your details, paynow registration information and check the status. If all is good, then call  1800-2222-888 (Monday to Friday, 8.30am to 5.30pm) to find out more. Alternatively, you may write to them at contactus@govtopup.gov.sg Source: https://www.singaporebudget.gov.sg/budget_2018/BudgetMeasures/sgbonus2 comments0
Question Poster02 Jan 2019Thanks thanks I called them and clarified :)HC Tang02 Jan 2019Hope your issue get sorted out and get your $ üòçüòú
